name: 极限挑战（The Challenge Of Limits）
name_original: 极限挑战（The Challenge Of Limits）
description:
This is an interesting multi level shooting VR game, each level has a specific time system, players can complete the task in each level. The game requires players to get scores and get different rewards within the specified time. Different levels of physical examination bring different tasks. Extreme challenge will launch different levels and extreme tasks for you to challenge in the future. Thank you for coming.
  • Players can shoot objects
  • Players can choose different object shapes to score
